bach.DataFrame.from_table¶

classmethod DataFrame.from_table(engine, table_name, index)[source]¶

Instantiate a new DataFrame based on the content of an existing table in the database.

This will create and remove a temporary table to asses meta data for the setting the correct dtypes.

Parameters

  • engine (sqlalchemy.engine.base.Engine) – an sqlalchemy engine for the database.

  • table_name (str) – the table name that contains the data to instantiate as DataFrame.

  • index (List[str]) – list of column names that make up the index. At least one column needs to be selected for the index.

Returns

A DataFrame based on a sql table.

Return type

bach.dataframe.DataFrame

Note

In order to create this temporary table the source data is queried.
